channel.title: Project Zeus
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Project Zeus[/size][/center] [i][b]What is Project Zeus?[/b][/i] Project TBA is a server, solo based around Pking & PvM, with a skill or two in between. [i][b]Why is this server unique? [/b][/i] This server provides satisfaction for all type of players, PvM or Pking. It's easy to get started, but hard to finish. Meaning, you can pk in decent gear all day, but it will take time to acquire the best. [i][b] Why should you join this server upon release?[/b][/i] This isn't a server ran by 12 year olds looking to make some money off donations, I'm putting forth my own money for a very nice VPS and web host. [i][b]Current Staff[/b][/i] Xi Xi Xi - Owner/Server Developer Slump40 Co-Owner/Web Developer [i][b]Wanna be apart of this Project? [/b][/i] I'm looking for someone to help us do some coding. We need some staff for our Alpha Release, Looking for 3-6 people to player the server, looking for bugs, exploits, ect. If you are interested in joining, make a post below & let me know! :) [i][b]Vps Specs[/b][/i]
4GB Ram 80 GB Disk Space 10 Virtual Processers 1500 GB of bandwidth
[i][b]Updates Since Release of thread:[/b][/i]
Fixed PvP Drops Added Drops to NPCS Fixed teleports Added interface for certain items in shop Redid chops Added Sell price to items Added thieving Added Dragon Pking
[b]Player VS Player-- 75% Complete[/b] [ul][li]Special Attacks[/li] [li]All Weapons have special attacks with correct emotes[/li] [li]Timers[/li] [li]Item dropping on death[/li][/ul] [i][b]Players VS Monster--25% Complete[/b][/i] [ul][li]Nex Drops[/li] [li]Nomad Drops[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li] [li]PvM Rewards[/li][/ul] [i][b]Alternate Sources of Money Making-- 75% Complete[/b][/i] [ul][li]Thieving[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Crafting[/li][/ul] [size=12pt][b]Media[/b][/size]

item.title: Project Zeus
item.dc:creator: @Xi_Xi_Xi Xi Xi Xi
item.description:
@Xi_Xi_Xi wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Project Zeus[/size][/center]

What is Project Zeus?
Project TBA is a server, solo based around Pking & PvM, with a skill or two in between.

Why is this server unique?
This server provides satisfaction for all type of players, PvM or Pking. It’s easy to get started, but hard to finish. Meaning, you can pk in decent gear all day, but it will take time to acquire the best.

Why should you join this server upon release?
This isn’t a server ran by 12 year olds looking to make some money off donations, I’m putting forth my own money for a very nice VPS and web host.

Current Staff
Xi Xi Xi - Owner/Server Developer
Slump40 Co-Owner/Web Developer

Wanna be apart of this Project?
I’m looking for someone to help us do some coding. We need some staff for our Alpha Release, Looking for 3-6 people to player the server, looking for bugs, exploits, ect. If you are interested in joining, make a post below & let me know!

Vps Specs

4GB Ram 80 GB Disk Space 10 Virtual Processers 1500 GB of bandwidth

Updates Since Release of thread:

Fixed PvP Drops Added Drops to NPCS Fixed teleports Added interface for certain items in shop Redid chops Added Sell price to items Added thieving Added Dragon Pking

Player VS Player-- 75% Complete

[ul][li]Special Attacks[/li]
[li]All Weapons have special attacks with correct emotes[/li]
[li]Timers[/li]
[li]Item dropping on death[/li][/ul]

Players VS Monster–25% Complete

[ul][li]Nex Drops[/li]
[li]Nomad Drops[/li]
[li]Tormented Demons[/li]
[li]PvM Rewards[/li][/ul]

Alternate Sources of Money Making-- 75% Complete

[ul][li]Thieving[/li]
[li]Mining[/li]
[li]Smithing[/li]
[li]Crafting[/li][/ul]
